title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB:
1. Insert a text item, data item, and dynamic text item in a table.
2. Set the text item and data item to display datetime values from a database table.
3. Set the dynamic text item to display the same datetime values from the same database table.
4. Ensure that the datetime values in the database table are in the same format.
5. Reload the table and observe the format of the datetime values in the text item, data item, and dynamic text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should have the same format in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
SR:
1. Investigate the code responsible for retrieving and displaying the datetime values in the text item, data item, and dynamic text item. 
2. Verify that the datetime values are being formatted correctly in both the dynamic text item and data/text item. 
3. If necessary, make changes to ensure consistent formatting of datetime values across all items.
